snippet: The Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art, in Hartford, is opening two permanent galleries dedicated to contemporary art, and the galleries have been refurbished and reinstalled with significant objects from the museum’s collection.
abstract: Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art will open two galleries dedicated to contemporary art created by Mark Rothko, Robert Rauschenberg, Jackson Pollock and more (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: The Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art, in Hartford, is opening two permanent galleries dedicated to contemporary art, and the galleries have been refurbished and reinstalled with significant objects from the museum’s collection.

headline.print_headline: A Museum’s New Spaces for Contemporary Art
